fields.title: Basic Obedience Bundle
fields.description: A complete toolkit for everyday obedience! This bundle helps you build foundational manners, attention, and recall ù perfect for dogs of any age who need structure and confidence.

fields.title: Reactivity & Behavior Bundle
fields.description: Designed to support dogs struggling with reactivity, noise sensitivity, or resource guarding. This bundle helps reduce stress and build emotional balance at home and in public.

fields.title: Rescue Support Bundle
fields.description: Tailored for new rescue parents, this bundle offers a mix of trust-building, anxiety reduction, and practical guidance for multi-dog homes or rescue transitions.

fields.title: Advanced Tricks & Skills Bundle
fields.description: Unlock your dogÆs inner genius with this trick-based bundle! Teach fun, flashy, and functional skills that build focus and boost confidence.

fields.title: Puppy Essentials Bundle
fields.description: Your essential starter kit for raising a well-behaved puppy! This bundle guides you through leash manners, crate training, bite inhibition, potty success, and managing natural puppy mischief ù all with kindness and clarity.

fields.title: Game On: Play & Train Pack
fields.description: Train through play! This bundle boosts recall, focus, and energy release with engaging activities your dog will love ù perfect for high-drive learners.
